commit.message:
Testcases for canonical mips nmadd/nmsub patterns with or w/o fast-math.

* gcc.dg/mips-nmadd-1.c: New test.
* gcc.dg/mips-nmadd-2.c: New test.

From-SVN: r86147

files.patch:

+	* gcc.dg/mips-nmadd-1.c: New test.
+	* gcc.dg/mips-nmadd-2.c: New test.
